channel.title: Nodulation on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Nodulation on funPlantGenes

item.title: GmEXPB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmEXPB2 Gene Name: β-expansin gene Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEXPB2, a Cell Wall β-Expansin, Affects Soybean Nodulation through Modifying Root Architecture and Promoting Nodule Formation and Development.

item.title: GmFWL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09G187000 Gene Symbol: GmFWL1 Gene Name: FW2-2-like1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The GmFWL1 (FW2-2-like) nodulation gene encodes a plasma membrane microdomain-associated protein.

item.title: GmMaT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G258000 Gene Symbol: GmMaT2 Gene Name: malonyl-CoA acyltransferase 2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Isoflavone malonyl-CoA acyltransferase GmMaT2 is involved in nodulation of soybean by modifying synthesis and secretion of isoflavones.

item.title: GmMAX2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmMAX2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmMAX2a restored atmax2 root hair defects and soybean root hairs were changed in GmMAX2a overexpression (GmMAX2a-OE) or knockdown (GmMAX2a-KD) mutants.

item.title: GmNINa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmNINa Gene Name: NODULE INCEPTION 1a Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A GmNINa-miR172c-NNC1 Regulatory Network Coordinates the Nodulation and Autoregulation of Nodulation Pathways in Soybean.

item.title: GmPT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPT7 Gene Name: phosphate transporter 7 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A nodule-localized phosphate transporter GmPT7 plays an important role in enhancing symbiotic N2 fixation and yield in soybean.

item.title: GmRIC1|GmCLE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13g292300 Gene Symbol: GmRIC1GmCLE1 Gene Name: Rhizobia-Induced CLE1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Here, we report that microRNA172c (miR172c) activates soybean (Glycine max) Rhizobia-Induced CLE1 (GmRIC1) and GmRIC2 by removing the transcriptional repression of these genes by Nodule Number Control 1 (NNC1), leading to the activation of the AON pathway.

item.title: GmRIC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.06g284100 Gene Symbol: GmRIC2 Gene Name: Rhizobia-Induced CLE2 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Here, we report that microRNA172c (miR172c) activates soybean (Glycine max) Rhizobia-Induced CLE1 (GmRIC1) and GmRIC2 by removing the transcriptional repression of these genes by Nodule Number Control 1 (NNC1), leading to the activation of the AON pathway.

item.title: GmSTF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G092700 Gene Symbol: GmSTF3 Gene Name: HYPOCOTYL5 orthologs TGACG-motif binding factors 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Shoot-to-root communication via GmUVR8-GmSTF3 photosignaling and flavonoid biosynthesis fine-tunes soybean nodulation under UV-B light.

item.title: GmUGT4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmUGT4 Gene Name: isoflavone 7-O-glucosyltransferase UGT4 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmUGT4 was expressed in the roots (mainly in lateral roots) of the 7-day-old seedlings and seeds, both of which contained abundant amounts of isoflavone conjugates.

item.title: GmYUC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g038600 Gene Symbol: GmYUC2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYUC2a mediates auxin biosynthesis during root development and nodulation in soybean.

item.title: GsSnRK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GsSnRK1 Gene Name: sucrose nonfermenting kinase 1 Genome: wild soybean genome database (https://www.

item.title: LjCCD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LjSGA_131670.1 Gene Symbol: LjCCD7 Gene Name: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE 7 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE 7 modulates plant growth, reproduction, senescence, and determinate nodulation in the model legume Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjENOD40–1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjENOD40–1 Gene Name: early nodulin-1 protein Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Two ENOD40 genes of L.

item.title: LjENOD40–2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjENOD40–2 Gene Name: early nodulin-2 protein Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Two ENOD40 genes of L.

item.title: LjERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjERF1 Gene Name: transcription factor AP2-EREBP Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: A Positive Regulatory Role for LjERF1 in the Nodulation Process Is Revealed by Systematic Analysis of Nodule-Associated Transcription Factors of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: MtCRE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17Chr8g0392301 Gene Symbol: MtCRE1 Gene Name: Cytokinin Response Element 1 Genome: M.

item.title: MtDMI2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr5g030920 Gene Symbol: MtDMI2 Gene Name: DOES NOT MAKE INFECTION 2 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The MtDMI2-MtPUB2 Negative Feedback Loop Plays a Role in Nodulation Homeostasis.

item.title: MtEFD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17_Chr4g0002631 Gene Symbol: MtEFD Gene Name: Ethylene response Factor required for nodule Differentiation Genome: Mt5.

item.title: MtEFD2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17_Chr3g0137174 Gene Symbol: MtEFD2 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR REQUIRED FOR NODULE DIFFERENTIATION 2 Genome: Mt5.

item.title: MtERF1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtERF1-1 Gene Name: B-3 Ethylene Response Factor Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The B-3 Ethylene Response Factor MtERF1-1 Mediates Resistance to a Subset of Root Pathogens in Medicago truncatula without Adversely Affecting Symbiosis with Rhizobia.

item.title: MtERF74
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr2g105380 Gene Symbol: MtERF74 Gene Name: Medicago truncatula ERF-VII TF 74 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Group VII ethylene response factors, MtERF74 and MtERF75, sustain nitrogen fixation in Medicago truncatula microoxic nodules.

item.title: MtERF75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr8g022820 Gene Symbol: MtERF75 Gene Name: Medicago truncatula ERF-VII TF 75 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Group VII ethylene response factors, MtERF74 and MtERF75, sustain nitrogen fixation in Medicago truncatula microoxic nodules.

item.title: MtLHY
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtLHY Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: These data shed new light on the roles of MtLHY in the orchestration of circadian oscillator in nodules and shoots, which provides a mechanistic link between nodulation, nitrogen assimilation, and clock function.

item.title: MtNRT2.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17_Chr4g0028551.1 Gene Symbol: MtNRT2.1 Gene Name: Genome: M.

item.title: MtPUB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtPUB2 Gene Name: U-box (PUB)–type E3 ligase 2 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The MtDMI2-MtPUB2 Negative Feedback Loop Plays a Role in Nodulation Homeostasis.

item.title: MtROP9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtROP9 Gene Name: small G-protein ROP9 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Silencing of the Rac1 GTPase MtROP9 in Medicago truncatula Stimulates Early Mycorrhizal and Oomycete Root Colonizations But Negatively Affects Rhizobial Infection.

item.title: NPF7.6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Mtr.27727.1 Gene Symbol: NPF7.6 Gene Name: Genome: JCVI Mt 4.

item.title: Rj4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.01g165800-D Gene Symbol: Rj4 Gene Name: Glycine soja thaumatin-like protein Genome: Species: Glycine soja Functional Descriptions: Rj4, a Gene Controlling Nodulation Specificity in Soybeans, Encodes a Thaumatin-Like Protein But Not the One Previously Reported.

item.title: ST6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr3g107810 Gene Symbol: ST6 Gene Name: Specific tissue protein 6 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Specific tissue proteins 1 and 6 are involved in root biology during normal development and under symbiotic and pathogenic interactions in Medicago truncatula.
